article_title: Biden Announces New Aid for Syrian Refugees
article_text:
ISTANBUL—Vice President Joe Biden on Saturday announced nearly $135 million in humanitarian aid to help feed civilians affected by Syria’s civil war.

Speaking in Istanbul, Mr. Biden said the money would raise the amount of aid the U.S. has provided to more than $3 billion since Syria’s crisis began in 2011.
